name: fakenet-signer
description: Multi-chain signature orchestrator for Solana - listens for signature requests, executes transactions on target chains (Ethereum, Bitcoin, etc.), and returns results. Includes Bitcoin adapters for mempool.space API and Bitcoin Core RPC.

scripts.release:patch: yarn version --patch --no-git-tag-version && yarn build && yarn publish
scripts.release:minor: yarn version --minor --no-git-tag-version && yarn build && yarn publish
scripts.release:major: yarn version --major --no-git-tag-version && yarn build && yarn publish
scripts.release:beta: yarn version --prerelease --preid=beta --no-git-tag-version && yarn build && yarn publish --tag beta
